amendment.description: Amendment strikes the the words "not to exceed" in reference to the available funding amount for the Office of Intelligence, Security, and Emergency Response in order to provide spending flexibility for DOT with respect to emergency responses and security issues.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the words "not to exceed" in reference to the available funding amount for the Office of Intelligence, Security, and Emergency Response.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 317 - 92 (Roll no. 419).
